RuleCondition.DescriptionLine: If authorisation type is 'CWP', authorisation holder id and the identification number of the declarant must be the same
If representation status is '3' (indirect representation) then authorisation type must be 'CW1' or 'CW2' (authorisation type 'CWP' for private warehouse is not allowed)
If additional procedure is 'F31', previous procedure must be '21'
If additional procedure is 'F32', previous procedure must be '51'
If additional procedure is 'F34', previous procedure must be '44'
If previous procedure is '21', there must be declared one of the following previous documents:
- type '337' and temporary storage declaration MRN (in AREX)
- type '355' and entry summary declaration MRN (in AREX)
- type '820', '821' or '952', and transit MRN

If previous procedure is '44', previous document must be declared with type 'IM' (national previous document type) and as reference is case identification number of end use declaration (and import must be found from other customs clearance system)
If previous procedure is '51', there must be declared one of the following previous documents:
- type 'IM' (national previous document type) and case identification number of inward processing declaration
- type 821 and transit MRN
If location address has been declared, country code must be 'FI' (at least in the CW pilot)
If previous procedure is 00 and dispatch country code is not 'NO', there must be declared one of the following previous documents:
- type 337 and temporary storage declaration MRN (in AREX)
- type 355 and entry summary declaration MRN (in AREX)
- type 820, 821 or 952, and transit MRN
If authorisation type is:
- 'CW1', warehouse type must be 'R'
- 'CW2', warehouse type must be 'S'
If authorisation type is 'CWP', warehouse type must be 'U'
If authorisation type is 'CW2', authorisation holder id and the identification number of the declarant must be different

In case the value of 'Number of Packages' is '0' then there should exist at least one goods item with the same 'Shipping marks' and 'Type of packages' with 'Number of Packages' with a value greater than '0'
If requested procedure is '71', there must be one of the following authorisation types: 'CWP', 'CW1', 'CW2'
It is not allowed to declare the same authorisation type more than once
There cannot be more than one declared customs warehousing authorisation ('CWP', 'CW1' or 'CW2')
There must be exactly one GoodsShipment.
The element must begin with a two digit country code (EU or non-EU - CL008)
If the format of the trader id is FI + 9 characters, then modulus validation of Finnish EORI id must be performed.
Format must be 'FI' + 7 digits + hyphen + check sum digit
If the format of the trader id is FI + 11 characters, then modulus validation of Finnish personal identification number must be performed.
Format must be 'FI' + 6 digits + '+', '-' or 'A' + 3 digits + check sum character
If qualifier identification (of location) is 'V', type of location must be A and value of location ID must be valid customs office ID (code list CustomsOffice)
If qualifier identification (of location) is 'X', type of location must be 'B' or 'C'
If qualifier identification (of location) is 'Z', type of location must be 'A', 'C' or 'D'
At least one of notification text or provided information must be present
At least one of description or document link must be present
Service provider has to be different from declarant and representative
For EIDR, there must be one of the following authorisation types: 'CWP', 'CW1' or 'CW2'
For EIDR, there must be authorisation type: 'EIR'
Commodity code (a 6-digit HS code or an 8-digit CN code or a 10-digit Taric code) must be valid in Taric on the acceptance date
If additional procedure is F34, previous procedure must be 44
If additional procedure is F34, previous procedure must be 44
If representative is used, then authorization holder cannot be the same as representative
Submiter ID must be the same as for declarant, representative or service provider in the original/amended declaration
'Goods Item Number' is always used even if 'Items' = '1'. In that case 'Goods Item Number' is also '1'.

Each 'Goods Item Number' is unique throughout the declaration. The items shall be numbered in a sequential fashion, starting from '1' for the first item and incrementing the numbering by '1' for each following item
The total number of packages is equal to the sum of all 'Number of packages' + a value of '1' for each declared 'bulk'

In case the data item/data group is used and has the same value(s) for all other goods items then the data group/data item on IMPORT OPERATION or CONSIGNMENT/GOODS SHIPMENT level is used, else the data group/data item on ITEM level is used
Declarant ID cannot be amended
IF the attribute 'Requested Procedure Code' = '31', '71', '76', '77' or '78'
THEN this attribute = 'O'
ELSE this attribute = 'R'
IF 'Type of packages' indicates 'BULK' (UNECE rec 21 : 'VQ', 'VG', 'VL', 'VY', 'VR', 'VS' or ‘VO’)
THEN 'Number of packages' can not be used
ELSE 'Number of packages' = 'R'
IF additional Information code 00500 is declared
THEN consignee cannot be declared
ELSE it is mandatory
If qualifier identification (of location) is 'Z', location address must be declared
ELSE it cannot be declared
If Qualifier of location is 'X' or 'V'
THEN location ID is required
ELSE If Qualifier = 'Z'
THEN Location ID cannot be used
ELSE location ID is 'O'
IF Trader office code is not used
THEN 'Name' and 'Address' must be declared
ELSE they cannot be declared
If additional procedure is F34, previous procedure must be 44
If previous procedure is '21' or '51'
THEN previous document must be declared
If Requested procedure is customs warehousing ('71')
THEN Authorisation holder and corresponding authorisation must be declared
